shelf.title: Warehouse Locations
shelf.subtitle: Location Management System
shelf.description: Create and manage warehouse locations with structured aisle-bay-level codes

dynamic.title: Dynamic Inventory
dynamic.subtitle: Real-time Stock Tracking
dynamic.description: Monitor live inventory movements and stock levels across warehouses, shipments and orders

stocktake.title: Stocktake
stocktake.subtitle: Physical Count & Reconciliation
stocktake.description: Schedule and manage physical inventory counts with variance reporting

history.title: Inventory History
history.subtitle: Stocktake Upload History
history.description: View and manage past stocktake uploads with location-level detail editing

dynamic.pageSubtitle: View real-time inventory status for each SKU
dynamic.avgCostTip: Weighted average cost of all inventory batches (USD)
dynamic.currentCostTip: FIFO cost used for outbound — earliest batch unit price
dynamic.invValueTip: Total value of current inventory (qty × cost)
dynamic.orderQtyTip: Ordered but not yet shipped quantity
dynamic.transitQtyTip: Shipped but not yet received quantity
dynamic.transitValueTip: Estimated value of in-transit products (incl. freight allocation)
dynamic.helpRow1: {sku} - Product code | {avgCost} - Weighted average cost of all batches (USD)
dynamic.helpRow2: {currentCost} - FIFO outbound cost (earliest batch) | {actualQty} - Physical count
dynamic.helpRow4: {transitQtyVal} - Shipped not received (incl. freight) | {invValueVal} - Qty × Cost

shelf.title: Location Management
shelf.subtitle: Warehouse location system for inventory tracking

download.title: Custom Barcode Download
download.subtitle: Select specific locations to generate barcode labels

delete.title: Delete Warehouse
delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete warehouse "{warehouse}"? This action cannot be undone. All shelf locations will be permanently removed.

empty.title: No Warehouses
empty.message: Get started by creating your first warehouse with shelf locations.

main.inventorySubtitle: Hover over locations to see stored products
main.productListSubtitle: All SKUs stored in this warehouse
main.noInventoryDesc: Upload a stocktake with location details to populate inventory data.
main.hasInventoryLocked: This warehouse has products stored. Layout editing is disabled.
main.lockedMessage: This warehouse currently has products stored in its locations. The shelf layout cannot be modified or deleted until all inventory is cleared.
main.hoverPromptDesc: Move your cursor over a shelf to see product details

table.noDataDesc: Upload a CSV file to start recording your inventory count data.

upload.title: Upload Stocktake Data
upload.desc: Select a date and upload CSV to record stocktake
upload.csvHint: CSV file: SKU, (skip), Qty/Box, Boxes, Aisle(L/R), Bay#, Level(G/M/T), Bin(L/R), Slot(L/R), Warehouse, (skip)
upload.dragDrop: Drag CSV file here, or click to select
upload.dateHint: Select the date this stocktake data belongs to
upload.dateExists: This date already has records, continuing will overwrite
upload.unknownSkuHint: The following SKUs don't exist in the inventory archive. Please correct or skip them.
upload.addSkuHint: To add new SKUs, go to the Data Center first, then come back to upload
upload.dataPreview: The following data will be written/updated
upload.locationCorrectionHint: The following locations from your CSV don't exist. Select the correct location from existing ones.

edit.title: Inventory Edit
edit.desc: Modify single item stock or delete an entire stocktake date
edit.dateHint: Select the stocktake date to modify or delete
edit.updateSingleDesc: Correct the stock quantity for a single SKU
edit.deleteDateDesc: Permanently delete all stock data for this date
edit.deleteWarning: You are about to delete stocktake date {date}. This will permanently remove all SKU data for this date.
edit.reasonPlaceholder: Please explain the reason for deletion
edit.mustBeNumber: New value must be a number
edit.mustBeInteger: New value must be an integer
edit.sameValue: New value is the same as current, no change needed
edit.aboutToExecute: About to execute the following changes
edit.aboutToDelete: About to permanently delete the following stocktake date

notes.updateSingleDesc: Select target date and SKU, enter new quantity (must be non-negative integer, different from current), confirm with security code
notes.deleteDateDesc: Select the stocktake date to delete. All SKU data under this date will be permanently removed. This action cannot be undone.

history.title: Upload History
history.subtitle: View and edit past stocktake uploads
history.noBatchesDesc: Upload stocktake data from the Stocktake page to see history here.
history.editWarning: You are about to modify inventory data. This will update the warehouse location inventory.
history.deleteWarning: Are you sure you want to delete {sku}?
history.addSkuDesc: Select a SKU from the product list and enter quantity or location details.
